title: Kristi Yamaguchi told Nancy Kerrigan to 'break a leg' on 'DWTS'
text:
Mar 22, 2017 at 7:13p ET 0Shares 
No doubt she meant well. But it appears Olympic figure skating gold medalist and ‚ÄúDancing With the Stars‚Äù Season 6 champion Kristi Yamaguchi had a bit of a word slip when she wished her fellow 1992 Winter Olympian Nancy Kerrigan to ‚Äúbreak a leg‚Äù before Kerrigan‚Äôs debut on Season 24 of ‚ÄúDWTS‚Äù on Monday: So excited for you @NancyAKerrigan ! Can't wait to see you grace that ballroom floor, break a leg! üíÉüèª #DWTS 
‚Äî Kristi Yamaguchi (@kristiyamaguchi) March 20, 2017 
Perhaps Yamaguchi didn‚Äôt remember that incident when Kerrigan was hit on the right knee by an assailant right before the 1994 nationals, planned by Kerrigan‚Äôs teammate and rival Tonya Harding‚Äôs ex-husband to take Kerrigan out of Olympic contention. 
The prime choice of words seemed to escape Kerrigan as well: Thank you so much Kristi! I'm excited to get this started said for the advice you had for me. this its a blast! https://t.co/MMagD7gLgw 
‚Äî Nancy Kerrigan (@NancyAKerrigan) March 20, 2017 
Though Yamaguchi‚Äôs turn of phrase did not escape her many Twitter followers, who responded with these pitch-perfect GIFs:
